summary: The 2022 Consensus festival is a showcase and celebration of all that crypto has to offer. Thousands of the world's brightest minds and impactful voices will take over Austin, Texas, June 9-12.
title: Can’t Make It To Consensus IRL? - Introducing the Virtual Pass
content: Enjoy Consensus from wherever you are with the Consensus Virtual Pass. The Consensus 2022 livestream, presented by Bitget, allows you to tune in from anywhere in the world to hear industry leaders explore all aspects of crypto, blockchain, Web 3 and the metaverse.
With the Virtual Pass, you can stream Consensus content from all conference stages, including Thursday’s Money Reimagined Summit, Creator Summit and Crypto Unlocked sessions.

The virtual pass will stream from the official Consensus website and mobile app, featuring content from all Consensus stages. Livestreaming begins on Thursday, June 9, and ends at the close of Consensus on Sunday, June 12. It will be available for 30 days following the event.
Use code THEBLOCK for 20% off your pass!  Learn more about the Virtual Pass and register here.
